sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { makeStyles } from '@material-ui/core/styles' import { Typography, Box } from '@material-ui/core' import Navbar from './Navbar' // CSS Styles const useStyles = makeStyles(theme => ({ mainContainer: { background: '#233' }, timeLine: { position: 'relative', padding: '1rem', margin: '0 auto', '&:before': { content: '""', position: 'absolute', height: '100%', border: '1px solid #3C1321', right: '40px', top: 0 }, '&:after': { content: '""', display: 'table', clear: 'both' }, [theme.breakpoints.up('md')]: { padding: '2rem', '&:before': { left: 'calc(50% - 1px)', right: 'auto' } } }, timeLineItem: { padding: '1rem', borderBottom: '2px solid #3C1321', position: 'relative', margin: '1rem 3rem 1rem 1rem', clear: 'both', '&:after': { content: '""', position: 'absolute' }, '&:before': { content: '""', position: 'absolute', right: '-0.625rem', top: 'calc(50% - 5px)', borderStyle: 'solid', borderColor: '#FFFED0 #FFFED0 transparent transparent', borderWidth: '0.625rem', transform: 'rotate(45deg)' }, [theme.breakpoints.up('md')]: { width: '44%', margin: '1rem', '&:nth-of-type(2n)': { float: 'right', margin: '1rem', borderColor: '#3C1321' }, '&:nth-of-type(2n):before': { right: 'auto', left: '-0.625rem', borderColor: 'transparent transparent #3C1321 #3C1321' } } }, timeLineYear: { textAlign: 'center', maxWidth: '9.375rem', margin: '0 3rem 0 auto', fontSize: '1.8rem', background: '#3C1321', color: 'white', lineHeight: 1, padding: '0.5rem 0 1rem', '&:before': { display: 'none' }, [theme.breakpoints.up('md')]: { textAlign: 'center', margin: '0 auto', '&:nth-of-type(2n)': { float: 'none', margin: '0 auto' }, '&:nth-of-type(2n):before': { display: 'none' } } }, heading: { color: '#FFFED0', padding: '3rem 0', textTransform: 'uppercase', }, subHeading: { color: '#EEE1B4', paddint: '0', textTransform: 'uppercase' } })) const Resume = () => { const classes = useStyles(); return ( <> Work Experience 2019 Summer Software Engineer Intern Richgra Inc. Implemented the custom responsive web UI components with HTML5, CSS3, React.Js.
Reimplemented backend architecture using Node.js and RESTful APIs.
Improved web page response time about 21% by applying AJAX to update partial page.
Optimized frontend DOM structure and reduced about 40% of page load time.
Designed data schema with MySQL database and reduced data redundancy for about 20%. 2019 Spring Frontend Web Developer Intern SetPeth LLC. Worked as co-leader frontend developer to improve the performance of the company website.
Redesigned and rebuilt the structure of the web site as a single page Web App by using React.Js.
Improved about 50% of client-side by combining images into CSS sprites to reduce HTTP requests, deploying multiple CDNs including Amazon CloutFront and CloudFlare, and applying pre-fetching and pre-rendering techniques to reduce loading time. 2018 Summer Software Engineer Intern Beijing YWSM Company Added features on web-based Human Resources Management System (HRMS).
Designed and implemented easy-to-use signup and login system from scratch.
Techniques including JavaScript ES6, Bootstrap, Spring Boot, and MongoDB.
 ) } export default Resume
